TekMexico SA de CV septiembre de 2015 mayo de 2018 2 aos 9 meses Besides working for the companys clients Listed in the projects section I was part of two projects an application to manage teams and set in order to suggest the best fit for each available position in a team or project Responsibilities for the chat application Define initial database model for users conversations and messages
